channel.title: What a Suprise?
channel.description:
Ok, heres the bloody story...
I am on a Macintosh (Mac) Computer. I have downloaded the Moparsacpe client. I can play on 2 servers (using their IP address' and none others that I have tried) it will log me in for a second then log me out. Fail.
Also, when I try to play ANY WEBCLIENT it comes up with this message: Java Plug-in 1.5.0_24 Using JRE version 1.5.0_24-b02-357-9M3165 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = /Users/(my name)
Also, when I try to make my own server. Sometimes I will just get stuck in one spot and when I log in on that account it will Disconnect ALWAYS! I then have to make a new account, which really annoys me.
I sometimes get a t1 and t2 errors...
Any input would be great! Thanks. :D
EDIT: How do I turn into another NPC? I know you do ::setnpc #### #### but something more would be helpful, thanks!

I’m hard, nice man. You made me laugh…

item.description:
@mopars0wn wrote:

Ok, heres the bloody story…

I am on a Macintosh (Mac) Computer. I have downloaded the Moparsacpe client.
I can play on 2 servers (using their IP address’ and none others that I have tried) it will log me in for a second then log me out. Fail.

Also, when I try to play ANY WEBCLIENT it comes up with this message:
Java Plug-in 1.5.0_24
Using JRE version 1.5.0_24-b02-357-9M3165 Java HotSpot™ Client VM
User home directory = /Users/(my name)

Also, when I try to make my own server. Sometimes I will just get stuck in one spot and when I log in on that account it will Disconnect ALWAYS! I then have to make a new account, which really annoys me.

I sometimes get a t1 and t2 errors…

Any input would be great! Thanks.
